trait.name: Hold Breath.
entries: The tracker can hold its breath for up to 1 hour.

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: The tracker has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Regeneration.
entries: The tracker regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. The tracker dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack.
entries: The tracker makes three attacks: one with its maw and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite.
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}24({@dice 4d8 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) slashing damage.
